name: GetLost
0:
”Alexa, ask Get Lost which way to go”
”Alexa, ask Get Lost should we go left or right”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: get lost
des: Get Lost interacts with people when faced with the decision of which way do we go next. The skill will choose left, right, straight, or U-TURN if asked without guidance. If you only have a few choices, then ask Get Lost if you should turn left or right. You get the idea, go have fun driving around and be CAREFUL out there. Don't play as the driver, just do as it says!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
